name: Prison Gunner Escape 3D
description:
Experience total modern apportionment assault of guards on you, but in this waylay fear house prison don't get scared you have to survive in this hard time to bring your gang member back or get yourself killed by guards. You have to show the guards imperial assault which you learn with your gang. So get ready to show global bushwhack assault in this cops and robbers gunners battle city.
Features
- First person bushwhack shooting.
- Use weapons for brutal attacking & to kill the guards.
- Visually attractive 3D environment.
- Interesting & Hardcore addictive gameplay.
- Smooth & simple controls.
